comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The photo was taken at a reception for New York Bull Moose gubernatorial candidate Oscar Straus, held at the Port Washington, Long Island, home of Bull Moose congressional candidate (and former Congressman) Bourke Cockran, on September 28, 1912 -- a kick-off event for the fall campaign of the Bull Moose (Progressive) Party in Nassau County. Story in The New York Times, September 29, 1912: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9F04EFD9113AE6... Other Bain/LOC photos of the Lawn Fete for Oscar Straus: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516557862/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515739507/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516557368/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516555780/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515739229/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515733737/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515733049/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516556764/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516556980/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515732783/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC: Cockran's name is misspelled in your title, as well as in Bain's.
